      • SIMInsert

        public static LunaKey[] SIMInsert(long authForm,
                  java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> authSecretList,
                  byte[] blob)
                           throws java.security.InvalidKeyException
        Insert a key blob onto the HSM. The keys will be put into the current default slot.
        Parameters:
        authForm - The auth form.
        authSecretList - A Collection of the password Strings
        blob - The key blob
        Returns:
        LunaKey[] the LunaKey array.
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidKeyException - if the authSecretList is specified and its size doesn't match authSecretCount.

      • SIMExtract

        public static byte[] SIMExtract(LunaKey[] lunaKeys,
                int authSecretCount,
                int authSubsetCount,
                long authForm,
                java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> authSecretList)
                         throws java.security.InvalidKeyException
        Extract a key blob from the HSM.
        Parameters:
        lunaKeys - The array of LunaKeys to be extracted. All of these keys must be in the same slot
        authSecretCount - The N value
        authSubsetCount - The M value
        authForm - The auth form.
        authSecretList - A Collection of the password Strings
        Returns:
        byte[] the key blob.
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidKeyException - if the authSecretList is specified and its size doesn't match authSecretCount.
